article_title: TensorOpera AI and Samsung Electronics Showcase the Future of Generative AI on Mobile Devices
summary: TensorOpera AI and Samsung Electronics have partnered to showcase the potential of deploying multi-modal generative AI applications directly on mobile devices powered by Samsung Exynos processors. This collaboration, unveiled at CES 2025, aims to revolutionize mobile technology by bringing personalized AI solutions that respect user privacy. The integration of generative AI on smartphones offers various possibilities, such as personalized creativity coaching, financial advice, and writing assistance. TensorOpera AI's end-to-end platform allows developers to design and deploy AI applications in hybrid edge-cloud environments, balancing efficiency, personalization, and privacy. This innovative approach democratizes AI by making advanced models accessible to a broader audience while paving the way for next-generation AI ecosystems.
